thread.section_title: Stellenbosch Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely historical hotel in center of town.
thread.title_full: Lovely historical hotel in center of town. - Review of Stellenbosch Hotel, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: HillyCapeTown
title: Lovely historical hotel in center of town.
text: Beautiful old buildings revamped into modern hotel. Friendly and helpful staff, cool and clean room, nice buffet breakfast with wide range of fresh fruit. Parking limited though. Excellent location in centre of busy student town. Room was facing to the back and therefore no noise problems. We enjoyed our stay termendously.
